name: Polluted Passage
description:
Swim through the cluttered waters of a Florida canal as the native choctaw bass. Avoid trash, runoff, and invasive species!

This game is meant to promote awareness for the fall of Florida's canals. I hope that while playing this game you learn about the threats the canals and other waterways are facing in our world.

Instructions:

Please note, in order to play the game you will have to complete the pre-survey first. Also after playing a few rounds, please take the post survey.

How to Play:

The goal is to avoid hitting the trash, runoff, and invasive fish.
Mouse: look around
Spacebar: Boost forward (grants bonus score)
Escape: Enter settings or leave game

If you need to reach out to me please add me on discord: Bradjoe1#4688
